ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How to Properly rip off a bard
ygData.msgSnippet: ok then, no worries, so is there anyone on sol ro who wants the coin just give koraden a tell and its yours for free ... From: John Grady
ygData.messageBody:
ok then, no worries, so is there anyone on sol ro who wants the coin just
give koraden a tell and its yours for free

----- Original Message -----
From: "John Grady" <john_grady@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 29, 2001 4:12 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to Properly rip off a bard


> At least on Xegony it wouldn't go for anywhere near 100pp. Probably 20pp
> just for the convenience of it. COM is hunted constantly for Reavers and
> such so the coins are easy to come by.
>
> Tzeetch
> Them Commune, Xegony
>
> Now, the Kaesora coin - that's another story...
>
> --- Qaelan <qaelan@...> wrote:
>
> G'day all i managed to pick up "an ancient coin"; from the captain of the
> guard in city of mist.
> My question is this: i know this is for the tambourine quest, but is this
> coin worth anything to a bard.
>
> No i dont want to take advantage of anyone, but i need to be able to
> afford next level spells as well :)
>
> So if this coin is worth 100pp or so, the first bard i see can have it for
> free... but if it is worth anything else, then how much?
>
>
> Koreaden
>
>
